Employees.Name: Laurent Dubois
Employees.JobResponsibilities:
Plans, organizes and manages the operations and activities of an accounts payables.
Supervises employees and monitors activities.
Final check of accounts payable payments and sign off.
Reporting to the head of finance.

"I am a diligent person. I put great attention to detail."

Employees.Name: Sabine Mayer
Employees.JobResponsibilities:
Implementing new Public Cloud ERP Financials system into his company and keeping it aligned with business.
During the initial set-up of an ERP system: Customizing Financial Accounting settings such as organizational  structures, chart of accounts, and tax configuration (as part of implementation projects).
During the ongoing maintenance of the configuration: Adapting the configuration to organizational and  process changes in business.

"I’m a versatile person. I keep the big picture in mind."

Employees.Name: Alain Chevalier
Employees.JobResponsibilities:
Responsible for a high number of accounts (ca. 4000 customers).
Monitor the credit risk of his customers.
Focus on changes in his customer’s credit situation.
Recurring checks on a regular basis.
Decide on credit blocked sales orders.
Decide on credit limits for his customers (according the company’s credit policy).

"I almost always find a pragmatic solution, that’s acceptable for my customers and my company."

Employees.Name: Monique Legrand
Employees.JobResponsibilities:
Ensure and adjust correct structuring of company (e.g. chart of accounts, legal/management entities , profit centers etc. …).
Ensure accuracy of financial data (profit center data).
Explain financial data for both compliance and management purposes  (Profit center reporting).
Execute, check, and explain period-end close.
Identify root causes of issues on accounts, track and correct these.

"I am a diligent person. I  put great attention to detail."

Finish the report (Working papers, findings).
Follow up action plans.

Employees.Name: Donna Moore
Employees.JobResponsibilities:
Keep Organizational Structure updated.
Organize and reorganize related objects into groups Keep object information up-to-date as needed.
Maintain overhead-related structures and objects so costs can be distributed fairly.
Trigger cost reposting to properly reflect changes that were not made in time.

"Everything needs to be as efficient as possible and always correct."

Employees.Name: Elena Petrova
Employees.JobResponsibilities:
Responsible for a high number of accounts (ca. 5000 customers).
Central contact for all internal and external requests for invoice related issues (e.g. manage disputes on invoices, set dunning blocks). (ca. 15-30 calls per day).
Post-processing of incoming payments; clearing accounts.
Collect Cash.
Manage accounting related master data of his customers.

"I am a diligent person. I put great attention to detail."
